Reviews.Title: “Goodness me!”
Reviews.Author: Peter D
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 night city break couple weeks ago mid november 2011 looked website looked little ready disappointed goodness couldnt believe reasonable price arrived 11 evening found entrance shut using intercom near door soon inside huge own kitchen perfect own breakfast kaisers supermarket opposite hotel plus queensized bed comfortable bathroom couldnt faulted ubahn 5 minutes walk 2 stops alexanderplatz sbahn buses public transport fault smelt slightly cigarette smoke nonsmokers doubt ill happier hotel

Reviews.Title: “Terrific hotel - ideal location”

Reviews.Content: fantastic stay nh hotel berlin upgraded suite amenities fantastic location hotel berlin 5 mins ubahn station range shops supermarkets near hotel stay berlin

Reviews.Content: nh huge included kitchenette impeccably clean furnishings bed couch particularly comfortable location fairly residential healthy 1520 minute walk downtown sights alexanderplatz plush central expecting price note pay credit card internet

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel august week faced directly construction site noisy requested facing courtyard afternoon nice views facing courtyard living tv kitchen microwave fridge freezer tons storage space clothes feel youre own little apartment neighborhood caveats hotel neighborhood deserve 1 construction loud able hear loud church bells five minutes 700am weekdays faced courtyard noise outside magnified rolling cart outside sound thunder youre light sleeper factors account 2 bed comfortable mattress hard 3 airconditioning provide fan kept cool heatwave hot 4 tub huge nice soak getting slippery difficult 53 husband commented unsolicited tub bit deep 5 tv german channels nice cnn 6 hotel code 30 minutes internet day own laptop period time pay positive 1 theres grocery store literally outside front hotel snacks super convenient bothered hotel breakfast able whatever day grocery store theres larger grocery store block thats 2 metro stop five minute walk hotel couple stops alexanderplatz walked alexanderplatz day 30 minute walk normal pace 3 hotel staff courteous professional housekeeping service dishes clean guests schedule earlier whatever prefer day quiet hallways 4 clean comfortable restaurants close hotel kitchen wasnt quick trip metro busier middle action near restaurants clubs probably wouldnt happy staying overall enjoyed stay hotel consider future trip

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful room - But the builders start at 7AM !”
Reviews.Author: kenandaxel
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 hotel june 2010 originally booked hotel trip berlin changed reservation nh hotel excellent experience nh dresden beginning arrived hotel 1030 pm relatively trip via public transport airport bus 50 mins followed 35 min walk underground 2 stops followed 5 min walk hotel hoped able drink bar bed unfortunately receptionist told serve breakfast bar nh hotels website lists property star hotel mention word bb hotel website official german hotel classification requirements star hotel minimum la carte restaurant hotel bar minimum expectation booked simply leaving reference basic facility automatically mean exist read trip advisor suite standard kitchenette disappointed kitchen living bathroom nice bedroom spotlessly clean bed comfortable tv bedroom living approx €80 night rate truly excellent standard unfortunately plan sleepin 9am 1st morning builders site directly outside 2nd floor window promptly started 7am bed shook started earth machine thankfully towards front hotel bad sleep builders started complained receptionist mainly advised advance hotel directly beside building site phone contact hotel time reservation hotel’s website makes mention regards building site offer change minimal difference noise level furthermore unpacked tight schedule remainder day time repack facilitate change morning saturday bad action begin morning notice noise sunday noise issue locality apartments square facing site banners hanging balconies choice protest messages builders development company eat breakfast €16 person charge excessive instead found nearby breakfast rolls cheese pastries excellent coffee breakfast cost hotel contrary comments site hotel central mentioned bakery range restaurants bars nearby unless underground alexanderplatz thursday night arrived walk nearly 10 minutes single restaurant served food price towards front hotel rate don’t expect require services hotel suit perfectly looking star service comfort outside recommendation look elsewhere
